kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=apiServeRest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

test.name: Fazer um Get Produtos com sucesso

kw.name: GET
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.
